mdRecord.dcterms:description: Narrative of arrival in Charlottesville to attend the University [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]

I hopped off the plane at CHO with dream and my green barbour | Welcome to the land of frats, exams | Am I gonna fit in? | Jumped in a Yellow Cab here I am for the first time | Look to my right & I see that UVA sign | This is all so crazy | Everybody seems so famous ...
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Personal narratives, American
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: University of Virginia. Library. New Stacks. Charlottesville, Virginia, United States
